name: MWOMercs.com Beta Forum Gray Color Scheme
description: Change color scheme from white-on-black to black-on-gray for improving readability
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);


/*---- response form -------------*/
.cke_contents
{
  border:solid 1px #696969 !important;
/*  background-color: gray !important;*/
}
.cke_top
{
  background-image: url(http://mwomercs.com/forums/public/style_images/master/editor/toolbar_bg.png) !important;
  /*background-color: #000 !important;*/
}
.input_submit
{
  color: black !important;
}

#contentBody
{
  color: #2f5168 !important;

}

/*------------------------------*/
.citation
{
  background-color: #f0f0f0 !important;
  color: black !important;
}

.blockquote, .quote
{
  background-color: #fafafa !important; 
}
/* ------- notify buttons -----*/
#inbox_link, #notify_link
{
  background-color: #444 !important;
}

/*------- server status ------*/
#topMenu .online a
{
  color: green !important;
  font-weight: bold !important;
}
#topMenu .offline a
{
  color: red !important;
  font-weight: bold !important;
}

/*-------- new question -------*/
.topic_buttons li a:hover, .ipsButton:hover
{
  color: black !important;
}
.topic_buttons li.important a, .topic_buttons li.important span, .ipsButton .important, .topic_buttons li a, .topic_buttons li span, .ipsButton
{
  color: black !important;
}

#forumContent
{
  background-color: #f0f0f0 !important;
  -moz-border-radius: 5px;
  border-radius: 5px;
}
html  ,
html *:not(:empty):not(.Emoticon):not(.cke_icon):not(.cke_top):not(.citation):not(.blockquote):not(.quote):not(#inbox_link):not(#notify_link):not(#forumContent),
html *:not(.cke_icon):not(.cke_top):not(.citation):not(.blockquote):not(.quote):not(#inbox_link):not(#notify_link):not(#forumContent):after ,
html *:not(.cke_icon):not(.cke_top):not(.citation):not(.blockquote):not(.quote):not(#inbox_link):not(#notify_link):not(#forumContent):before
{
  background-image : none !important;
  background-color: #fcfcfc !important; 
}

html
{ 
  background-color: rgb(231, 232, 233) !important;
  border-color     : #444 !important

}

body
{ background-color : #ececec !important ;
  border-color     : #666 !important;
  color            : #2e414c; !important ;
  
background-position-x: 50% !important;
background-position-y: 0% !important;
background-size: initial !important;
background-attachment: initial !important;
background-origin: initial !important;
background-clip: initial !important;
  
}

body#body, window
{ background-color: #f5f5f5 !important
}

body *:not(.cke_icon):not(.cke_top) ,
html *:not(.cke_icon):not(.cke_top):after ,
html *:not(.cke_icon):not(.cke_top):before,
{ 
  background-color : transparent !important;
  border-color     : #666        !important;
  color            : inherit     !important;
  text-shadow      : none        !important
}








.head  ,
.header  ,
*[id*="title"]  ,
*[id*="Title"]  ,
*[id*="head"]  ,
*[id*="Head"]  ,
*[class*="header"]  ,
*[class*="Header"]  ,
*[id*="hlavicka"]  ,
*[id*="Hlavicka"]  ,
*[class*="hlavicka"]  ,
*[class*="Hlavicka"]
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}


header  ,
#head  ,
#header  ,
#top
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}




*[id*="nav"] *[class*="page"] ,
.navlist a  ,
.Navlist a  ,
*.navigation a  ,
*[id*="menu"] a  ,
*[id*="Menu"] a  ,
*[id*="navig"] a  ,
*[id*="Navig"] a  ,
*[id*="-nav"] a  ,
*[id*="-Nav"] a  ,
*[id$="nav"] a  ,
*[id$="Nav"] a  ,
*[class*="menu"] a  ,
*[class*="Menu"] a  ,
*[class*="navig"] a  ,
*[class*="Navig"] a  ,
*[class*="-nav"] a  ,
*[class*="-Nav"] a  ,
*[class$="nav"] a  ,
*[class$="Nav"] a
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}


label  , 
nav a  ,
menu a  ,
#menu a  ,
#navigation a
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}

div[class*=menu][class*=vertical]
{ background-color: #f5f5f5 !important
}




#menu a:hover  ,
#navigation a:hover ,
*[class*="menu"][class*="item"]:hover
{ background-color : #000 !important
}




div[id*="side"]  ,
div[id*="Side"]  ,
div[class*="side"]  ,
div[class*="Side"]
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}


aside  ,
.aside  ,
#aside
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}



footer  ,
div[id*="foot"]  ,
div[class*="foot"]  ,
div[id*="paticka"]  ,
div[class*="paticka"]
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}







*[class*="heading"]  ,
*[class*="Heading"]  ,
*[id*="heading"]  ,
*[id*="Heading"]  ,
*[class*="nadpis"]  ,
*[class*="Nadpis"]  ,
*[id*="nadpis"]  ,
*[id*="Nadpis"]
{ border-color : #888 !important
; color        : #f5f5f5 !important
}




h1
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; border-color     : #eee !important
; color            : #000 !important
}

h2  ,
h3  ,
h4  ,
h5  ,
h6  ,
caption  , 
thead  ,
th  , 
lh  , 
dl dt  , 
html fieldset legend   
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; border-color     : #999 !important
; color            : #000 !important
}



blockquote  ,
code  , 
tt  , 
xmp  ,
pre
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}

td
{ border-color     : #555 !important
}

hr
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; border-color     : #666 !important
; color            : #000 !important
}







*[id*="important"]  ,
*[id*="Important"]  ,
*[class*="important"]  ,
*[class*="Important"]
{ border-color : #666 !important
; color        : #000 !important
}

b  ,
b *  ,
i  ,
i *
{ border-color : #555 !important
; color        : #000 !important
}


tt  ,
var  ,
em  ,
em *  ,
strong  ,
strong *
{ border-color : #666 !important
; color        : #000 !important
}





.copyright
{ color : #111 !important
}
.error
{ color : #111 !important
}
.warning
{ color : #111 !important
}
.example
{ color : #111 !important
}
.issue
{ color : #111 !important
}
.note
{ color : #111 !important
}
.search
{ color : #111 !important
}






table
{ background-color: #f0f0f0 !important
}
thead  ,
tfoot  
{ background-color: #fff !important
}



html body *[onclick]:hover ,
html body *[ondblclick]:hover ,
a[href^='javascript:'] ,
a[href='#']
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}


label[for]  ,
a:link  ,
a:link *
{ border-color : #399 !important
; color        : #2f5168 !important
}

label[for]:focus  ,
label[for]:hover  ,
a:link:focus  ,
a:link:hover
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; border-color     : #9ef !important
; color            : #2f5168 !important
}

a:link:focus *  ,
a:link:hover *
{ border-color : #9ef !important
; color        : #2f5168 !important
}

a:visited  ,
a:visited *
{ border-color : #690 !important
; color        : #2f5168 !important
}

a:visited:focus  ,
a:visited:hover
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; border-color     : #9c3 !important
; color            : #2f5168 !important
}

a:visited:focus *  ,
a:visited:hover *
{ border-color : #9c3 !important
; color        : #2f5168 !important
}

a:visited:focus img ,
a:visited:hover img
{ outline-width: 1px
; outline-style: solid
; outline-color : #9c3 !important
; color        : #2f5168 !important
}




a:active  ,
a:active *
{ border-color : #600 !important
; color        : #2f5168; !important
}


.button ,
.tlacitko ,
html button  ,
html select  ,
html input
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}

html input[type="password"]
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}

html textarea  ,
html input[type="text"]  ,
html input:not([type])
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; color: #000 !important
}

html textarea:hover  ,
html input[type="text"]:hover  ,
html input:not([type]):hover
{
}

html input:hover ,
html button:hover ,
html select:hover ,
html textarea:hover
{ color : #000 !important
; border-color: #ccc !important
; background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}

html textarea:focus  ,
html input:focus  ,
html textarea:focus ,
html button:focus
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; border-color     : #999 !important
; color: #000 !important
}
html textarea:focus:hover  ,
html input:focus:hover  ,
html button:focus:hover ,
html textarea:focus:hover
{ border-color     : #fff !important
}

html input[type="password"]:focus
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}

input[disabled]
{ color : #c5c5c5 !important
}





html button  ,
html select  ,
html input  ,
html textarea
{ -moz-appearance : none !important
; background-image: none !important 
}




*[id*='content']  ,
*[class*='content']  ,
li:hover li ,

div[id^=webdeveloper]
{ background-color : #f3f3f3 !important
}


div[style~="url(chrome://flashblock/content/flash.png)"]
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}


td.quantifier > div  ,
div.graph > div#tomGraph
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}


span#__firefox-findbar-search-id
{ background-color : #9ff !important
}

*[class*=block][style*=block]  ,
*[class*="wrap"] ,
*[id*="notify"] ,
*[id*="widget"] ,
*[id*="pane"] ,
*[class*="widget"] ,
*[class*="Overlay"][class*="Dialog"] ,
*[class*="modal"] ,
*[id*="modal"] ,
*[class*="dialog"] ,
*[id*="wrapper"] ,
*[class*="wrapper"] ,
*[id*="Wrapper"] ,
*[class*="Wrapper"] ,
*[id*="tooltip"] ,
*[class*="tooltip"] ,
*[id*="Tooltip"] ,
*[class*="Tooltip"] ,
*[id*="popup"] ,
*[class*="popup"] ,
*[id*="Popup"] ,
*[class*="Popup"] ,
*[id*="flyout"] ,
*[class*="flyout"] ,
*[id*="Flyout"] ,
*[class*="Flyout"] ,
#pop
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
}


img:hover
{ background-color: #f5f5f5 !important
}



body#viewsource 
{ margin: 0 !important
}

body#viewsource 
,
body#viewsource pre 
{ background-color: #f5f5f5 !important
}

body#viewsource .start-tag
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .end-tag
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .comment 
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .cdata 
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .doctype 
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .pi 
{ color: #000 !important
; font-style: italic
}
body#viewsource .entity 
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .text 
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .attribute-name
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .attribute-value 
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .markupdeclaration 
{ color: #000 !important
}
body#viewsource .error
, 
body#viewsource .error > :-moz-any(.start-tag, .end-tag, .comment, .cdata, .doctype, .pi, .entity, .attribute-name, .attribute-value) 
{ color: #000 !important
; font-weight: bold;
}



.Item.New strong ,
span.newmessage
{ color: #000 !important
}



div.ac_results ul[style] ,

*[role] ,

li#imagebox_bigimages > div ,

#tphdr.tphdr ,

#rg_h.rg_hv
{ /*background-color: #000 !important*/
    
}


#loading .lpb #lpt  ,

div[role="option"].Jd-axF.Jd-Je.Je  ,

.oZ-x3.xY.GZubNd  ,
.PF.xY.PE  ,

[style^="width:"][style$="%"]  ,
[style^="width:"][style$="%"]  ,
[style^="width:"][style$="%;"]  ,
[style^="width:"][style$="%;"]  ,
[class*="progress"][style]  ,
[width$="%"][style]  ,
[class*="bar"][style] 
{ background-color: #f5f5f5 !important
}






.ac_results .ac_even.ac_over  ,
.ac_results .ac_odd.ac_over  ,
#current  ,
#selected  ,
#active  ,
.current  ,
.selected  ,
.active  ,
.current a ,
.selected a  ,
.active a
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; color            : #000 !important
}

*[id*=Current]  ,
*[id*=Selected]  ,
*[id*=Active]  ,
*[id*=current]  ,
*[id*=selected]  ,
*[id*=active] ,
*[class*=Current]  ,
*[class*=Selected]  ,
*[class*=Active]  ,
*[class*=current]  ,
*[class*=selected]  ,
*[class*=active] ,
*[id*=Current] a ,
*[id*=Selected] a  ,
*[id*=Active] a  ,
*[id*=current] a  ,
*[id*=selected] a  ,
*[id*=active] a ,
*[class*=Current] a  ,
*[class*=Selected] a  ,
*[class*=Active] a  ,
*[class*=current] a  ,
*[class*=selected] a  ,
*[class*=active] a
{ background-color : #f5f5f5 !important
; color            : #000 !important
}


div#lbHoverNav a#lbPrev ,
div#lbHoverNav a#lbNext ,

.tagsWrapper ,
div.faceBox[style] ,
div.tagBox[style] ,

a.noHrefOverride ,
a.noHrefOverride:hover ,
a.noHrefOverride:focus ,

[id$="overlay"] + [id$="wrap"] > [id$="outer"] > a {
    background-color: transparent !important;
}


h1,h2,h3,h4 
{
  /*font: normal 13px arial !important;*/
  
  font: bold 24px/24px 'HelveticaNeue LT CYR 57 Cond' , arial !important;
  font-size: 2em/24px !important;
  letter-spacing: 0px !important; 
  color: #2f5168 !important;
  background-color: transparent !important;
}

h1[class*=ipsType_pagetitle]
{
  font: bold 18px arial !important;
  font-size: 1.6em !important;
  color: #2f5168 !important;
}

.post_body .post
{
  color: #2E414C !important;
}
